programme.title: Manasa Kanya

programme.title: Chhaya O Chhobi
programme.desc: Rai, an actress, suddenly disappears from an ongoing shooting of her film leaving everyone clueless about her whereabouts.

programme.title: Dwitiyo Purush
programme.desc: A police inspector investigates and tries to uncover dark secrets of a series of murders that resemble the crimes from 25 years ago.

programme.title: Singhasan Battisi
programme.desc: Lord Indra gifts a throne decorated with thirty-two beautiful figurines to the mighty King Vikramaditya. The figurines narrate the stories about the greatness of the king.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: A young couple must overcome internal conflicts and a series of problems that arise due to a criminal accusation in order to be united in love.

programme.title: Tintoretor Jishu
programme.desc: Feluda succeeds in solving the mystery of a famous painting by the Italian maestro Tintoretto when the it gets stolen from the original owner.

programme.title: Ram Lakshman
programme.desc: Subhankar, a police officer is murdered for arresting a wicked Minister's son. Determined to seek revenge, his adopted son, Ram, ventures out to protest against the wicked Minister and his gang.

programme.title: Mon Sudhu Toke Chai
programme.desc: A landlord's daughter falls in love with the son of a worker, who resides at their house as a helper. Upon discovering this secret, her father decides to get her married to another man.

programme.title: Agnishapath
programme.desc: Ajit Singh is the leader of a night guard party in a town in Punjab and lives with his wife, son and daughter. He and his family get killed by a terrorist leader.

programme.title: Tik Tik Tik
programme.desc: The Indian Space Research Organisation recruits Vasu on a special mission where he and his team must stop an asteroid advancing towards Earth.

programme.title: Tik Tik Tik
programme.desc: The Indian Space Research Organisation recruits Vasu on a special mission where he and his team must stop an asteroid advancing towards Earth.

programme.title: Aradhana
programme.desc: Vandana's husband, Arun, gets killed in an air crash but no one accepts their marriage. Thereafter, she is forced to put her child up for adoption and later work as his nanny to stay by his side.

programme.title: Jamaibabu Zindabad
programme.desc: Kajol, a managing director, and Sagar, the chief mechanic at a private firm, are always at loggerheads. A series of events bring them closer hinting at ending their mutual animosity.

programme.title: The Legend Of Devi Durga
programme.desc: Goddess Durga sets out to kill Mahishasura, a demon who accomplishes his evil motives by shape-shifting into different forms.

programme.title: Naayak
programme.desc: Siddharth and Charan, two lookalikes who are fighting their own battles against evildoers, cross paths and join forces to take down Rawat, a ruthless minister.

programme.title: Coolie
programme.desc: Seema, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, falls in love with Shiba, a labourer. Complications arise when Seema's father refuses to accept their relationship.

programme.title: Kelor Kirti
programme.desc: Three young couples are caught in a web of misunderstanding when a charming woman walks into their lives. Thereafter, they keep facing hilarious situations and fall into trouble.

programme.title: Sriman Bhootnath
programme.desc: A kind and uneducated man finds employment with a powerful patron. Things take a turn when the latter's daughter harbours animosity and craftily seeks his dismissal.

programme.title: Zor
programme.desc: Surjo, a sportsperson, rescues Sumi from the clutches of Indrajit, an influential gang leader who tries to marry her using force.

programme.title: Jaaneman
programme.desc: Deba, a young man, decides to elope with the girl of his dreams, after rescuing her from her to-be-husband. However, they are constantly chased by a gang of hooligans.

programme.title: Vinci Da
programme.desc: Vinci Da is a maker of prosthetics who struggles to make a living off his talent. His skills make him the target of Adi Bose, an ex-convict with a morally questionable mission.

programme.title: Meher Aali
programme.desc: Meher Ali, a Muslim boy who lives with his widowed mother, falls in love with a Hindu girl. His life turns upside down when he gets convicted as a terrorist and imprisoned for life.

programme.title: Majnu
programme.desc: Aditya, an assistant director, tries to impress Suma by narrating his old love story. However, while narrating the story, he realises his true feelings for his ex-lover.

programme.title: Ami Je Ke Tomar
programme.desc: Aditya, a commitment-phobic hotelier, loves Esha, his innocent employee. Things get complicated when Esha's past comes to the fore and he realises that Prachi, his associate, loves him.

programme.title: Jamai Badal
programme.desc: Krish, a young and carefree man, falls for Barsha while on a trip with his friend. However, Barsha only wishes to marry an orphan, which creates trouble for him.

programme.title: Loveria
programme.desc: A car mechanic, Aditya, falls in love with Sweety, a spoiled child. Although they want to get married, Sweety's father is against their relationship.

programme.title: Arundhati
programme.desc: When Arundhati visits her native village, she learns that she looks exactly like her great-grandmother, Jejamma, a warrior princess, and she must defeat the evil forces to survive.

programme.title: Cheeni
programme.desc: When situations compel Cheeni to move back into Mishti's house to care for her, the mother-daughter duo's roles get switched, forcing them to understand each other's perspectives.

programme.desc: Ashok and Kumar end up in a mental hospital due to their uncle's foul play. When the doctor is convinced of their sanity, she mistakenly releases their lookalikes from the same hospital.

programme.desc: One fateful Thursday in the city of Mumbai invites tremendous horror when Naina, a nursery school teacher, holds 16 children hostage and produces a list of unfathomable demands.

programme.desc: Bhagwan Dada comes from humble beginnings and dreams of becoming a superstar. Years later, he becomes a legend in Indian Cinema.

programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: She Wang
programme.desc: When a deadly serpent attacks several villagers, a group of hunters must find a solution to save the lives of people from the dangerous venom bites.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: I'll Always Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: A group of teenagers covers up the accidental death of someone by burning the body. A year after the incident, a mysterious figure with a hook begins killing the group members one by one.

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy who is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan. However, she lands in a dilemma after she places a curse on his daughter, Aurora, in order to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Peggy, a single mother of four children, seeks the help of occult investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren when she and her children witness strange, paranormal events in their house.

programme.title: Masterchef USA
programme.desc: Passionate cooks hailing from various parts of the US compete against each other in culinary challenges to showcase and develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef.

programme.title: 10,000 BC
programme.desc: D'Leh belongs to the tribe of hunters and gatherers who reside in the mountain range in the Urals. When his tribe is attacked, the love of his life is taken as prisoner and the men as slaves.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After his father's death, T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to inherit his throne. However, a powerful enemy related to his family threatens to attack his nation.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: Thomas and his friends attempt to break into The Last City, a stronghold controlled by the villainous WCKD, to rescue a companion who is being imprisoned and tortured.

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: A rainstorm separates Arlo, a young Apatosaurus, from his family. While travelling through a harsh landscape, he befriends Spot, a feral child, who helps him reunite with his family.

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: When the 12 bronze heads of the Chinese zodiac are stolen, JC and his team are assigned to retrieve them. However, during the course of their mission, they encounter numerous challenges.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: The Avengers must stop Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, from getting his hands on all the infinity stones. However, Thanos is prepared to go to any lengths to carry out his insane plan.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Deadpool protects a young mutant Russell from the authorities and gets thrown in prison. However, he escapes and forms a team of mutants to prevent a time-travelling mercenary from killing Russell.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Deadpool protects a young mutant Russell from the authorities and gets thrown in prison. However, he escapes and forms a team of mutants to prevent a time-travelling mercenary from killing Russell.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: The Monkey King decides to accompany Tang Sanzang, a monk who aims to retrieve sacred scriptures. On their way, they encounter an evil demon who seeks immortality at great cost to Sanzang.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Upon escaping the maze, Thomas and his friends are shifted to a facility run by Mr Janson. When they realise his intent, they escape, only to face the scorching heat in a lifeless world.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: Will, a blacksmith, joins forces with Captain Jack Sparrow, a pirate, to rescue the love of his life from Jack's associates, who have kidnapped her suspecting she has his medallion.

programme.title: Masterchef USA
programme.desc: Passionate cooks hailing from various parts of the US compete against each other in culinary challenges to showcase and develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: The all-powerful mutant Apocalypse, who is long revered as a god, wants to cause extinction on earth. The X-Men must work together to demolish his plans.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: Rapunzel, a naive and young girl, is locked up by her overly protective mother. Her wish to escape into the world outside finally comes true when she meets the good-hearted thief, Flynn.

programme.title: Jack The Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young man unintentionally rekindles an ancient war between the humans and a race of giants. In the midst of all this, he continues to pursue his lady-love as he tackles the giants.

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: Moana, daughter of chief Tui, embarks on a journey to return the heart of goddess Te Fitti from Maui, a demigod, after the plants and the fish on her island start dying due to a blight.

programme.title: Rise Of The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: Caesar, a chimpanzee, has been with Will ever since he was born, and, with a new drug, he can think and react like humans. When Caesar finds himself subjected to injustice, he decides to revolt.

programme.title: Underworld: Rise Of The Lycans
programme.desc: Lucian, a werewolf slave, convinces his Lycan compatriots to rebel against their vampire masters, who are led by Viktor, a powerful vampire elder. This leads to a full-fledged war between the two.

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights.

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn Of The Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid invites trouble by stealing three eggs from a dinosaur causing his friends Manny, Ellie, who is pregnant, and Diego to seek help from Buck to rescue him.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: When a series of extreme weather events begin to plunge the world into a new ice age, scientist Jack Hall embarks on a risky mission to New York City to rescue his trapped son.

programme.title: Ip Man: The Awakening
programme.desc: Ip Man prevents a kidnapping attempt during his visit to Hong Kong. His heroic action prompts a human trafficking ring to retaliate by holding his friends captive and it is up to Ip Man to save them.

programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences.

programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights.

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn Of The Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid invites trouble by stealing three eggs from a dinosaur causing his friends Manny, Ellie, who is pregnant, and Diego to seek help from Buck to rescue him.

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow

programme.title: The Expendables

programme.title: Operation Red Sea

programme.title: Toy Story 2

programme.title: Imlie

programme.desc: Vandana, a family-oriented woman, and Kunal, a practical man, have contrasting personalities but both like music. As they cross paths, a series of ups and downs ensue in their lives.

programme.title: Anupamaa

programme.title: Honganasun
programme.desc: An intelligent girl who excels in her academics is pressurised by her father to abandon her studies and get married to a man of his choice.

programme.title: Anupama - Sarvagunaa Sampanne
programme.desc: Anupamaa loves her husband and her family but she does not get the respect she deserves. Later, when she discovers her husband's affair, she decides to live life on her own terms.

programme.title: Neenade Naa
programme.desc: An educated girl from a wealthy family accidentally gets married to an illiterate local gangster living in a slum. However, love finds a way in this marriage of countless adjustments.

programme.title: Udho Udho Shri Renuka Yellamma
programme.desc: Goddess Parvati takes the form of two girls Renuka who is born to a royal family and Yellamma who is born to a family in a village in order to protect people from evil.

programme.title: Yadiyuru Shri Siddalingeshwara
programme.desc: Lord Shiva incarnates himself as a saint, Sri Siddalingeshwara Swamy, to vanquish the evil forces and restore peace on Earth.

programme.title: Katheyondu Shuruvagide
programme.desc: A self-reliant woman and an arrogant, hardworking, rich man fall for each other. However, their love undergoes a test of time due to family feuds.

programme.title: Neenade Naa
programme.desc: An educated girl from a wealthy family accidentally gets married to an illiterate local gangster living in a slum. However, love finds a way in this marriage of countless adjustments.

programme.title: Avanu Matte Shravani
programme.desc: Shravani insults Surya and his family. But, to Nisha's utter shock, Surya informs the actual truth about Nisha to Shravani and her family.

programme.title: Udho Udho Shri Renuka Yellamma
programme.desc: Goddess Parvati takes the form of two girls Renuka who is born to a royal family and Yellamma who is born to a family in a village in order to protect people from evil.

programme.title: Kaveri Kannada Medium
programme.desc: Kaveri, a Kannada teacher in a village, takes up the challenge of tutoring at an English-medium school owned by an arrogant businessman, Agastya, in order to rebuild the school built by her father.

programme.title: Namma Lachhi
programme.desc: A young prodigy singer lives in a village with her mother, uncle and aunt. However, following her mother's death, she sets out to find her father, the identity of whom she is unaware.

programme.title: Katheyondu Shuruvagide
programme.desc: A self-reliant woman and an arrogant, hardworking, rich man fall for each other. However, their love undergoes a test of time due to family feuds.

programme.title: Radha Krishna
programme.desc: Radha and Krishna fall in love with each other but after Radha receives a curse that she will be separated from her lover, Krishna is reborn.

programme.title: Aase

programme.title: Gowri Shankara
